description: After two months without visitors, Pairi Daiza is welcoming the public back, but in smaller numbers.
title: Coronavirus: Belgian zoo comes back to life from lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Belgian zoo comes back to life from lockdown - BBC News
maintext: "He's looking forward to seeing a hippopotamus," one mother told me about her son. "But today he's really just as excited to be out of the house and in the car again."
